name: Milly saves the Day
description:
While relaxing at home, Milly suddenly gets a call from her dad, the Evil Dr. N. He has forgotten his duplicator and need her to go down to his 'office', to find it and bring it to him. 

Play as Milly, as she for the first time enters her fathers lab and must traverse challenges and puzzles to get to the teleporter and save the day!
